definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Hui hai behaved calm after listen to, but also to his nephew and general manager of MingWei lectured.
sentences.chinese: 汇海听后表现镇定，还向其侄儿兼总经理明威训话。

sentences.english: Such majestic demeanor as befits a nephew of mine.
sentences.chinese: 气势如虹，不愧是朕的侄儿。

sentences.english: Yes, I said what big nephew are willing to listen to, also can understand.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，我说什么大侄儿都肯听，也都能听懂。

sentences.english: His nephew took it in both his own, and pressed it to his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他的侄儿用双手捧住这手，把它按在他的嘴唇上。
我是你的侄儿，麦罗斯叔叔。

sentences.english: The old man made mats by weaving bamboo slats together into a jigsaw-like pattern.
sentences.chinese: 有人听到他侄儿说有朝一日要把那老人干掉。

sentences.english: My nephew committed all the letters from his girl friend to the flames.
sentences.chinese: 我侄儿把他女朋友给他的所有的信件都付之一炬。

sentences.english: Unlike my nephew your Crown Prince who only knows to sing and dance.
sentences.chinese: 不像朕的侄儿，也就是你们的太子，只会唱戏。

sentences.english: On my arrival home, my little nephew rushed out to take my bag.
sentences.chinese: 我一到家，我的小侄儿就冲出来给我拿包。

sentences.english: West Court disease widow, nephew after bed alone.
sentences.chinese: 西院病孀妇，后床孤侄儿。

sentences.english: I'm only looking out for my favorite nephew.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在为我心爱的侄儿着想。

sentences.english: The nephew made free with his uncle' s money.
sentences.chinese: 这侄儿乱花他叔叔的钱。

sentences.english: The whole family know great nephew and I the most eccentric aunt most iron.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都知道大侄儿和我这个最偏心的大姑最铁。

sentences.english: Destiny, guard our girls, A Christmas wish from your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 您的侄儿祝您圣诞欢九九论坛愉。

sentences.english: Little nephew saw, is very like, take to play.
sentences.chinese: 小侄儿看见了，很是喜欢，就拿去玩。

sentences.english: Lady think QinQiong is his nephew.
sentences.chinese: 夫人认为秦琼就是自己的侄儿。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
